name: 梅雨の日
summary:
It was raining that day

The family was ready to visit the amusement park, but plans are cancelled due to weather. This is a story about an ordinary family spending time at home during rain.

Rainy Season is a narrative game that allows players to listen to the rain and live a mundane day as a child. The game is playable to finish in 40 minutes.
